faqs.question: What is the difference between an independent house and a builder floor in this sector
faqs.answer: An independent house typically refers to a self-contained unit built on a plot of land with complete ownership of the land and the structure allowing maximum customisation and privacy. Both offer independent living but the house provides more control over the building structure and surrounding area.
